EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Dallas_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow taking place on Tuesday the 8th of August in Dallas. For those attending the Data Science Workshop, please remember to bring your own laptop.
Date: Tuesday, 8 August 2017
Time:
8:00am - 9:00am Breakfast 9:00am - 12:15pm Sessions 12:15pm - 1:15pm Lunch 1:15pm - 5:15pm Data Science Workshop
Location:
Pivotal Dallas Office 3001 Hackberry Rd, Irving TX 75063 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/3001+Hackberry+Rd,+Irving,+TX+75063/@32.9253229,-96.9878627,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x864c299f7ae50267:0x363018885ba50150!8m2!3d32.9253184!4d-96.985674?hl=en]]>)
Use the Pivotal front door entrance, directly to the right of Corelogicâ€™s main entrance.
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/dallas?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
Parking Pivotal has designated parking on the right side of the building, the spaces are underneath the canopies. There will be a security guard present as you approach the spots, let them know you are here for a Pivotal event and they will direct you to a spot. If all the canopy spots are full you may also park in the uncovered parking that is right past the canopy covered parking. If you have any questions, feel free to email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>. We look forward to seeing you, The Pivotal Team
